name: Holt Vancouver
description: Luxury brand known for modern, Italian-crafted leather goods, apparel & accessories for men & women.
address: Holt Vancouver, 737 Dunsmuir St, Vancouver, BC V7Y 1E4
status: Closes soon  9 p.m.  Opens 10 a.m. Sat

featured_reviews.review_id:
Here's the corrected version of your text:

"I bought a pair of shoes $$$$ for a wedding, and after wearing them for just 5 hours, I noticed there was pilling on the back of one shoe. I visited the store for a solution, but they didn't take responsibility for it. They quoted me around $150 and said it would take 5 to 6 weeks to fix. I am very disappointed with the product and the customer service. I will never buy another Gucci product again."

featured_reviews.review_id: I bought Gucci Ophidia cross body mens bag 2 months ago and used only 3 times carefully, however quality is so bad that leather just flaked out and when I went to boutique to ask for service and confirm me for price, they took my bag and confirmed to reach me to check service charges confirmation in a week or two and its been a month with no feedback and when I called store they say status on the system shows "Waiting for customer feedback" and no one ever reached out to me. So the lady on the call confirmed to write email to the boutique to call me and its been two days no one reached out to me still. So pathetic quality product and above the pathetic customer service. The audacity of this brand I tell you. I recommend Gucci brand to please learn some quality and customer service from "Coach" I bought few bags from them and they have amazing customer service and quality. They even remember my name everytime I walkin and makes me feel welcome and above everything quality of product is just amazing. I will go to the boutique and take my bag and never ever buy gucci again.

featured_reviews.review_id: If you visit Gucci women's store at HR, please look for Andy Tran. He will show you what EXCEPTIONAL service means. He is a very caring and genuine person. After shopped there once, I received a handwritten greeting card from Andy. During pandemic, Andy also sent wishing well emails. I could also stay home and buy from him. He was very patiently showing me the products through emails and texts. Andy also checked the products carefully before shipping them to me. You can also buy Gucci men's wear from him too. Strongly recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text: If you visit Gucci women's store at HR, please look for Andy Tran. He will show you what EXCEPTIONAL service means. He is a very caring and genuine person. Strongly recommend!

featured_reviews.review_id: I got profiled based on my outfit and skin color. I'm a heavy duty mechanic making 4 times the amount their staff can withhold. Very unfortunate. Please re evaluate who you hire and your loss prevention team.
featured_reviews.review_text: I got profiled based on my outfit and skin color. I'm a heavy duty mechanic making 4 times the amount their staff can withhold. Very unfortunate. Please re evaluate who you hire and your loss prevention team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great customer service! I gave 3-stars as when we first walked in for about 10min no sales person made an eye contact or acknowledged us. When customer walks into the store one must acknowledge the customer within 30-50 Seconds.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great customer service! I gave 3-stars as when we first walked in for about 10min no sales person made an eye contact or acknowledged us. When customer walks into the store one must acknowledge the customer within 30-50 Seconds.

featured_reviews.review_id: Very nice and friendly sales at the Gucci Jewelry counter.  Thank you Jessica for your service.  Will definitely come back to buy more from you next time!
featured_reviews.review_text: Very nice and friendly sales at the Gucci Jewelry counter.  Thank you Jessica for your service.  Will definitely come back to buy more from you next time!

featured_reviews.review_id: Love coming here. Salespeople are extremely kind and helpful unlike other stores
featured_reviews.review_text: Love coming here. Salespeople are extremely kind and helpful unlike other stores

featured_reviews.review_id: Terrible experience, purchased a wallet as a gift for Christmas, never used and tried to exchange it for a more expensive product. Was refused as it was over the 14 days policy. Would have been nice if that was mentioned and not just given a card that had the policy. Took my business to the Gucci store at the Fairmont and received amazing customer service.
